<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/payment-methods/cards/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Update an existing card payment method in the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `payment-method:write`

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
